name: ExecutionProjectGuidedTask
comment: An entity that stores the meta-data driven runtime task instances. External systems are notified of their manual tasks using these guided tasks. A guided task gets created after multiple failed retries of an activity and eventually gets notified and assigned to the external systems or queues.
vf short description: An entity that stores the meta-data driven runtime task instances. External systems are notified of their manual tasks using these guided tasks.

fields.name: ExecutionProjectGuidedTaskSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: ValidFromDate
fields.comment: BI field which represents record validity begin in EDWH

fields.name: ValidUntilDate
fields.comment: BI field which represents record validity end in EDWH

fields.name: KeyTypeId
fields.comment: Key type of record

fields.name: ExecutionProjectGuidedTaskKey
fields.comment: Unique identifier for the execution project guided task in aLDM. GT.ID//Generated Key on Execution Project Guided Task Id

fields.name: ExecutionProjectGuidedTaskId
fields.comment: Indicates a unique identifier for a task in the source. GT.ID

fields.name: CompletionTime
fields.comment: Indicates the task completion timestamp, if completed. GT.COMPLETED

fields.name: OssCreationDate
fields.comment: Indicates the task creation date. GT.CREATED

fields.name: OssModificationDate
fields.comment: Last modification date of the task in source, if any. GT.UPDATED

fields.name: TaskSourceId
fields.comment: Indicates the task in the Task Management System. This attribute is used by external entities to relate to the task or the project. GT.TASK_ID

fields.name: TaskName
fields.comment: Label of the task as shown on the Graphical User Interface (GUI). ACT_RU_TASK.NAME_

fields.name: ExecutionProjectSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: ExecutionProjectGuidedTaskStateSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: ExecutionProjectGuidedTaskTypeSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: ExecutionPlanSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: ExecutionPlanActivitySK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: AssigneeEmployeeSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: OwnerEmployeeSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: TaskPriorityId
fields.comment: Specifies the priority of the execution project guided task. ACT_RU_TASK.PRIORITY_

fields.name: TaskDueDate
fields.comment: Specifies the due date by when the task should be completed. ACT_RU_TASK.DUE_DATE_

fields.name: WorkingQueueName
fields.comment: Stores the work queue to which the task is assigned. ACT_RU_VARIABLE.TEXT_Where ACT_RU_VARIABLE.TASK_ID_ = ACT_RU_TASK.ID_ and ACT_RU_VARIABLE.NAME_= WorkQueue

fields.name: Delegation
fields.comment: ACT_RU_TASK.DELEGATION_

fields.name: SuspensionState
fields.comment: ACT_RU_TASK.SUSPENSION_STATE_

fields.name: TechnicianName
fields.comment: ACT_RU_VARIABLE.TEXT_Where Act_Ru_Variable.Task_Id_ = Act_Ru_Task.Id_ and ACT_RU_VARIABLE.NAME_= TaskOwnerName

fields.name: TaskDesc
fields.comment: ACT_RU_TASK.DESCRIPTION_

fields.name: ExecutionProjectGuidedTaskStatusSK
fields.comment: BI field: AI surrogate key

fields.name: ExecutionProjectGuidedTaskConvergedStatusSK
fields.comment: BI field: AI surrogate key for converged attribute

fields.name: ExecutionProjectGuidedTaskStatusDate
fields.comment: Indicates the date when the status changed.

fields.name: ExecutionProjectGuidedTaskConvergedStatusDate
fields.comment: Indicates the date when the converged status changed.

fields.name: SourceSystemId
fields.comment: Represents the code of the source system that the leading entity of the current target is coming from. It is suffix also include the code of the DB instance on that system such that in case of multiple instances of the same source system are deployed (Scalability) it will be possible to trace the target to it is source system instance

fields.name: DeleteIndicator
fields.comment: Set to True when the leading source entity of this target entity was deleted in the source system

fields.name: RowUpdateTime
fields.comment: The time stamp when the row was written to the Target real-time/staging storage

fields.name: SourceUpdateTime
fields.comment: The latest create/update timestamp of any of the entities composing this target entity

fields.name: SourceQueryTime
fields.comment: The timestamp of reading the data from source system. - when using CDC it is usually similar to the latest update, in SQL cases it is the time of running the SQL. When a dummy target entity is created as a temporary entity to maintain referential integrity this indicator will be set to True. As soon as the real target entity is stored it will be stored with False dummy indicator value.

fields.name: DptiId
fields.comment: Counter which represents the cycle number of the job	is_deleted	boolean	is_deleted	Represents if the record is deleted. Is been updated after the compaction job

fields.name: PTime
fields.comment: Partition time based on the event time for target entities marked to be partitioned event time rounded the correct partition window (hourly, daily etc..)

fields.name: Insert_Load_Id
fields.comment: BI technical field for job id which inserted the record in the table

fields.name: Update_Load_Id
fields.comment: BI technical field for job id which updated the record in the table
